text: Gina L. Gershon (born June 10, 1962) is an American actress, singer and writer. She has been in many movies, including the 1995 movie Showgirls. She has also been in many television programs and sitcoms. She was born in Los Angeles. category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:1962 births Category:Living people
title: Gina Gershon
